#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int a[100002];
long long int inv;
inline int fastread()
    {
    int i=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<48) c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>47)
    {
    i=i*10+c-48;
    c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return i;
    }
void divide(int ,int );
void merg(int ,int ,int );
int main()
{
    int t,n;
     t=1;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        n=fastread();

        for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
        {
            a[i]=fastread();
        }
        divide(0,n-1);
       printf("%lld\n",inv);
        inv=0;
    }
    return 0;
}
void divide(int start,int endi)
{
    if(start<endi)
    {
        int mid=(start+endi)>>1;
        divide(start,mid);
        divide(mid+1,endi);
        merg(start,mid,endi);
    }
}
void merg(int start,int mid,int endi)
{
  int i=start,j=mid+1,p=0;

  int temp[endi-start+1];

  while(i<=mid&&j<=endi)
  {
      if(a[i]<=a[j])
      {
          temp[p++]=a[i++];
      }
      else
      {
          temp[p++]=a[j++];
          inv+=(mid-i+1);
      }
  }
  while(i<=mid)
    temp[p++]=a[i++];

  while(j<=endi)
    temp[p++]=a[j++];
  p=0;
  for(int i=start;i<=endi;++i)
  {
      a[i]=temp[p++];
  }
}
